mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM SCHEDULE ORDER BY SCHEDULE_ID DESC) WHERE CLUB_NAME = #{clubName} and ROWNUM <= 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE (SCHEDULE_ID, CLUB_NAME, DATE_TIME, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL) VALUES (SEQ_SCHEDULE.NEXTVAL,#{clubName},#{dateTime},#{address},#{addressDetail})
mapper.select: SELECT M.ID FROM SCHEDULE_USER A JOIN Member M ON M.MEMBER_NO = A.USER_NO WHERE A.SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM SCHEDULE_USER WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}
